Reviews.Content: My fiance reallly likes it! If you buy the camera get the whole package because it comes with a memory card and you need that

Reviews.Title: BEST SMALL DIGITAL EVER
Reviews.Author: B. JONES "British Invasion Enthusiast"
Reviews.Content: We got this camera for work to take to meetings, gatherings, etc.  It has WAY more features than we ever imagined!

ProductInfo.Features:
1.5" Dual View Front LCD
SMART features - Social Media Upload, E-mail, Direct Link, Mobile Link
PC Auto-backup, Remote Viewfinder, All share, Cloud Service
720p HD Video
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung DV150F 16.2MP Dual-View Smart Camera w/ Built-in Wi-Fi in White + 8GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
